journal-meta.journal-title: Journal of Feline Medicine and Surgery

title-group.article-title: High incidence of ‘Dag-like’ sperm defect in the domestic cat

permissions.copyright-holder: International Society of Feline Medicine and American Association of Feline Practitioners

abstract.p: Ana Izabel S Balbin Villaverde, Eduardo G Fioratti, Renata S Ramos, Renato C F Neves, Guilherme S Cardoso, Fernanda C Landim-Alvarenga, and Maria Denise Lopes J Feline Med Surg 2013; 15: 317–322, DOI: 10.1177/1098612X12469368

body.p: An error appeared in the ‘Semen evaluation’ section on page 318 of the above article. The second sentence should have read: ‘After dilution in Talp HEPES 0.6% bovine serum albumin, total sperm count was determined …’, and not 6% bovine serum albumin, as stated.
The authors apologise for the error.
